text: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّي وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ

translation.en: [Jesus said], "And indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path
translation.id: (Isa berkata), "Dan sesungguhnya Allah itu Tuhanku dan Tuhanmu, maka sembahlah Dia. Inilah jalan yang lurus
